mapper.insert: INSERT INTO storage ( order_num, excute_time, product_id, material_report_num, production_batch, storage_num, contact_num, remark, storage_type, update_time, create_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNum}, #{excuteTime}, #{productId}, #{materialReportNum}, #{productionBatch}, #{storageNum}, #{contactNum}, #{storageType}, #{remark}, now(),now())
mapper.select: SELECT count(s.id) FROM storage as a,product as p

SELECT s.order_num, s.excute_time, p.name as proName, p.pic_num as proPicNum, p.material_num as proMaterialNum, s.material_report_num, s.production_batch, s.contact_num, s.storage_num, s.remark FROM storage as s,product as p
ORDER BY s.create_time DESC LIMIT ${(pageIndex-1)*pageSize},#{pageSize}
